dct_title_s: Carte de la Terre Sainte divisée dans toutes ses parties selon le nombre des tribus d'Israel
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, drainage, vegetation, settlements, land divisions among the twelves tribes of Israel, places of historical interest.
4 bar scales on map given in "Mille pas", "Stades", "Lieues de France", "Milles d'une heure".
Descriptive text throughout and around the margins.
Appears in Chatelain's Atlas historique, Chez François L'Honoré & Châtelain, vol. 5.
